abstract.fr: padthv1 est un synthétiseur polyphonique additif à l'ancienne
abstract.null: padthv1 is an old school polyphonic additive synthesizer

description.null:
padthv1 is an old-school polyphonic additive synthesizer with stereo fx.

features:

  • pure stand-alone JACK client with JACK-session, NSM and both JACK MIDI and ALSA MIDI input support;
  • LV2 instrument plugin. URI: http://padthv1.sourceforge.net/lv2
